fastpay:section:title: Fast Pay
fastpay:section:descrip: More than 30 days to get paid? With LoadsApp, it’s past time, loads delivered, payment in your bank in less than 5 days on premium loads.
fastpay:section:descrip:list:1: Select loads you want to apply
fastpay:section:descrip:list:2: Choose InstaPay option on load details
fastpay:section:descrip:list:3: Wait while your request is processed
fastpay:section:descrip:list:4: Use it! No commissions, no questions.

fastpay:factoring_details:title: Factoring Details and Conditions

notification_settings:section:title: Settings
notification_settings:loads_alerts:title: LOADS ALERT
notification_settings:loads_alerts:desc: Send me alerts of my loads status
notification_settings:loads_alerts:desc2: If you active this check we send you alerts when your loads status is changed
notification_settings:assigned_loads:des: Notify me when my loads were assigned
If you active this check we send you alerts when your loads were assigned
notification_settings:cancelled_loads:de: Notify me when my loads were canceled
If you active this check we send you alerts when your loads were canceled
notification_settings:delivered_loads:de: Notify me when my loads were delivered
If you active this check we send you alerts when your loads were delivered
notification_settings:carrierprecie_driv: Show to driver the price of load
If you active this check we will show the price of load to driver
notification_settings:carrier_apply_load: If you active this check we will let your drivers apply to loads
notification_settings:save:error: There is an error, please try to do it again
